div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Sept. 17, 1922. FOR A GOOD CAUSE

body.p: The following persons mailed their contributions to us for the benefit of the Brnenska Utulna (Old People's Home at Brno Czechoslovakia): Mrs. Anna Bubenik, San Benito, Texas, $1; Mrs. Frances Vitek, Howells, Kansas, 75 cents; Mr. Frank Prudik, New Bedford, Massachusetts, 25 cents; Mrs. Mary Brumek, Edge, Texas, 25 cents; Mr. Frank Skach, Ludkovice, Czechoslovakia, 20 cents.
Toward a gift of honor for the Czech novelist, Mrs. Popelka Bilian, the following contributions were received: Mrs. Sindler....$1; Mr. Frank Prudik, New Bedford, Massachusetts, 50 cents.
